# Esoteric

## Meanings

### Adjective

Intended for or likely to be understood by only a small number of people with a specialized knowledge or interest.

> esoteric philosophical debates

abstruse, obscure, arcane, recherch√©, rarefied, recondite, abstract, difficult, hard, puzzling, perplexing, enigmatic, inscrutable, cryptic, Delphic
